trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event of a <xref href="System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il metodo che gestisce il **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** evento di un <xref href="System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The AnonymousIdentificationEventHandler delegate is defined for the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> class.
trans-unit.target: Il delegato AnonymousIdentificationEventHandler è definito per l' <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>evento della <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>classe.</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>

trans-unit.source: You can access the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> class by specifying a subroutine named **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: È possibile accedere il <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>evento del <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>classe specificando una subroutine denominata **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** nel file Global. asax dell'applicazione ASP.NET.</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating> event is raised during the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.PostAuthenticateRequest> event.

The <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> constructs an <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs> object using the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>costruisce un <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>mediante l'oggetto corrente dell'oggetto <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>e lo passa al **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** evento.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs> object supplied to the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event to set the anonymous identifier to a custom value.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>oggetto fornito per il **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** evento per impostare l'identificatore anonimo su un valore personalizzato.</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A> property during the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event, a <xref:System.Guid> is used.
trans-unit.target: Se non si specifica un valore per il <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>proprietà durante il **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** evento, un <xref:System.Guid>viene utilizzato.</xref:System.Guid> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>

trans-unit.source: The **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event is only raised when anonymous identification is <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A> by setting the configuration element to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Il **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** evento viene generato solo quando è l'identificazione anonima <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>impostando l'elemento di configurazione `true`.</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>
